caption: Gaetano Gandolfi (San Matteo della Decima 1734–1802 Bologna), formerly attributed to Domenico Pedrini (Italian, 1728–1800), after Gaetano Gandolfi (San Matteo della Decima 1734–1802 Bologna), Orpheus and Eurydice. Black chalk; 19.9 x 14.5 cm. Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr. (x1947-12)
